column5: SXSW South Austin Rental, 8 miles from the heart of downtown. Close proximity to I-35, South Congress, and South First Street. Easy access to the heart of Austin. Wonderful apartment amenities for your use, including resort style pool, 24 hour fitness center, and business center.
column8: SXSW Rental 2 bed/ 2 bath (8 Miles from downtown)
